game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Player of the game and actions related.
    Author:
    Adriano Kaito

      • newPosition

        public int newPosition(int position,
                       int boardSize)
        Finds Player's new position on the board after rolling the dices.
        Parameters:
        position - Previous position + sum of the dices
        boardSize - Board size
        Returns:
        The new position on the board

      • hasMoneyToPay

        public boolean hasMoneyToPay(double cost)
        Checks if Player has enough money to purchase a property or pay penalty.
        Parameters:
        cost - Cost of the Property / Penalty
        Returns:
        True if money is sufficient or else false

      • checkRoundTheBoard

        public void checkRoundTheBoard(int previousPosition)
        Checks if Player has rounded the board. If so, earns $200.
        Parameters:
        previousPosition - The position before rolling the dices
